description:
Shinogi Mafuyu is another magical girl who is met by http://anidb.net/ch78244 [Yuzuka] and http://anidb.net/ch78242 [Chiya], and then befriends them. She is one grade higher in school than Yuzuka and Chiya. After she transforms, she is fit into Santa Claus suit.
Source: Wikipedia
name: Shinogi Mafuyu
